LanguageData.ThingDefFishSduiggles.label: sduiggles
LanguageData.ThingDefFishSduiggles.description: Found in the swamps and shallow waters. Behind the appearances, this kind of squid is very affectuous and intelligent. Who would like to fish it? You monster!
LanguageData.ThingDefFishSduiggles_Meat.label: Fish meat
LanguageData.ThingDefFishSduiggles_Corpse.label: sduiggles corpse
LanguageData.ThingDefFishSeasnake.label: seasnake
LanguageData.ThingDefFishSeasnake.description: Often mistaken for its wild tailteeth cousin, this peaceful fish is often caught during moonless nights.
LanguageData.ThingDefFishSeasnake_Corpse.label: seasnake corpse
LanguageData.ThingDefFishMashgon.label: mashgon
LanguageData.ThingDefFishMashgon.description: A medium shellfish often found in the swamps and marshes. Its name comes from the local tribespeople calling it "marsh dragon". Easy to catch and fast to breed, this is a good basic protein source. Not really nourishing but really tasty, it can be grilled for a better flavour.
LanguageData.ThingDefFishMashgon_Corpse.label: mashgon corpse
LanguageData.ThingDefFishBlueblade.label: blueblade
LanguageData.ThingDefFishBlueblade.description: A very common fish found in shallow water. Its name comes from its resilience: it is able to live both in hot blue lagoons or in icy blue waters.
LanguageData.ThingDefFishBlueblade_Corpse.label: blueblade corpse
LanguageData.ThingDefFishTailteeth.label: tailteeth
LanguageData.ThingDefFishTailteeth.description: This ferocious predator owns its name to its vicious tactics. Slowly approaching its unaware drinking preys, it uses its massive tail to attract them into deep water. The teeth is generaly the last vision you can get from this terrible creature.
LanguageData.ThingDefFishTailteeth_Leather.label: tailteeth leather
LanguageData.ThingDefFishTailteeth_Corpse.label: tailteeth corpse
